title: Christian Caregiving: Practical Advice for a Happy Ending
description: The Perfect Primer! Based on personal experience and extensive research, “Christian Practical Advice for a Happy Ending” is the perfect primer to understand caregiving within a spiritual context. It is easy to read, cuts through the fog of current jargon and programs and provides relief from the anxiety of caring for loved ones. You will want to share it with your family and others who are entering this phase of life. Chapters include caregiving basics, getting affairs in order, being an advocate, choosing a housing option, facing spiritual issues, and navigating to the finish line.
author: Patti Greene
